sentences.en: A substance, such as a toxic gas, or an event, such as drowning, that induces asphyxia.
sentences.cn: 窒息剂, 窒息原因导致窒息的物质, 如有毒气体, 或一事件, 如溺水.

sentences.en: After 6 min of asphyxia, epinephrine and bicarbonate were given and CPR instituted.
sentences.cn: 窒息6min后, 给肾上腺素和碳酸氢钠并立即开始心肺复苏.

sentences.en: Conclusion birth asphyxia may suffer from more attacks of gastroesophageal acid reflux than the normal controls.
sentences.cn: 结论窒息后新生儿酸性胃食管返流较对照组明显增加,各项参数已超过病理性胃食管返流诊断标准.

sentences.en: Conclusions Asphyxia can reduce the emptying function of the gallbladder and make the gallbladder enlarge.
sentences.cn: 结论窒息可使新生儿胆囊排空功能明显减弱,使新生儿胆囊扩张.

sentences.en: Death was due to asphyxia through smoke inhalation.
sentences.cn: 死亡是由烟尘吸入导致窒息引起的。

sentences.en: Do the children have any neonatal asphyxia, birth trauma, congenital diseases, or stunt?
sentences.cn: 是否有新生儿窒息 、 产伤 、 先天性疾病 、 发育迟缓等?

sentences.en: Methods: The level of Na + ( Una ) and � � 2 - micoglobulin ( � � 2 - MG ) in urinary were detected in neonates with asphyxia.
sentences.cn: 方法采用生化法和放射免疫分析法(RIA) 分别检测窒息新生儿尿钠 ( Una ) 水平和反映肾小管损伤的指标-β2微球蛋白 ( β 2-MG ).

sentences.en: Objective To analyze obstetrical factors of neonatal asphyxia so as to reduce the incidence.
sentences.cn: 目的分析新生儿窒息的产科原因,有效地降低新生儿窒息的发生率.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the relationship between neonate asphyxia and serum CK - MB changes.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨新生儿窒息与血清CK-MB的关系.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the affects of perinatal asphyxia on the renal blood flow of newborn.
sentences.cn: 目的探索窒息后新生儿肾血流动力学的变化规律.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the cause of fetal asphyxia of mothers with intrahepatic cholestasis of pregnancy ( ICP ).
sentences.cn: 目的探讨妊娠肝内胆汁淤积症 ( ICP ) 胎儿宫内缺氧的原因及机理.

sentences.en: Result Blood osmotic pressure of newborns with neonatal pneumonia neonatal jaundice, asphyxia, cold injure.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨患病新生儿血渗透压改变及其对疾病转归的影响.

sentences.en: Results: In newborn Apgar mark ≤7 of asphyxia, the incidence of intracranial hemorrhage volume are increased obviously.
sentences.cn: 结果: 新生儿评分≤7分出现新生儿窒息时, 颅内出血的发病率明显增高,出血量也多.

sentences.en: The fetal distress and neonatal asphyxia rate were lower in the study group ( P 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 研究组胎儿窘迫、新生儿窒息率显著低于缩宫素引产组 ( P0.05 ).

sentences.en: The most dramatic and urgent sympton in the acutely injured patient is asphyxia.
sentences.cn: 急性伤员的最令人惊恐和紧急的症状是室息.

sentences.en: To summarize 46 cases of severe neonatal asphyxia recovery and nursing.
sentences.cn: 总结46例新生儿重度窒息的复苏与护理.

words.tran_cn: 动物窒息器；碳酸气灭火器

phrases.tran_cn: 新生儿窒息，初生仔畜窒息

trans.tran_en: death caused by not being able to breathe
